mapper.update: UPDATE elib SET el_lg=#{el_lg}, el_md=#{el_md}, el_subject=#{el_subject}, el_writer=#{el_writer}, el_pub=#{el_pub}, el_info=#{el_info} where el_idx=#{el_idx}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM elib WHERE el_idx like 'AB%'
select * from (select rownum as rnum, a.* from (select * from elib where el_idx like 'AB%' order by el_idx desc)a)b where rnum>=(#{cp} -1) * #{ls} +1 and rnum <= #{cp} * #{ls}
SELECT * FROM elib WHERE el_idx = #{el_idx} order by el_idx desc
select * from (select rownum as rnum, a.* from (select * from elib where el_idx like 'AB%' ${where} order by ${orderName} )a)b where rnum>=(#{cp} -1) * #{ls} +1 and rnum <= #{cp} * #{ls}
SELECT el_idx FROM elib WHERE el_idx = #{el_idx}

select * from (select rownum as rnum, a.* from (select * from elib where el_idx like 'AB%' AND LOWER(el_subject) LIKE LOWER('%${simpleSerchText}%') ORDER BY ${orderName} )a)b where rnum>=(#{cp} -1) * #{ls} +1 and rnum <= #{cp} * #{ls}
select count(*) from elib where el_idx like 'AB%'
